hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'packages/(vscode-extension|core)/'; then touch /tmp/claude-sessions-vsix-rebuild-needed; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'packages/web/'; then touch /tmp/claude-sessions-web-modified; fi
if [ -f /tmp/claude-sessions-web-modified ]; then rm /tmp/claude-sessions-web-modified && echo '[ui-confirm] Web UI가 수정되었습니다. /ui-confirm 으로 확인하세요.'; fi
if [ -f /tmp/claude-sessions-vsix-rebuild-needed ]; then echo '[vsix] VSCode 확장이 수정되었습니다. /vsix 로 빌드 및 설치하세요.'; fi

if [ -f /tmp/claude-sessions-vsix-rebuild-needed ]; then rm /tmp/claude-sessions-vsix-rebuild-needed && cd /Users/david/Sync/AI/projects/claude-code-sessions && pnpm --filter @claude-sessions/core build && pnpm --filter claude-sessions package && code --install-extension packages/vscode-extension/claude-sessions-*.vsix --force 2>/dev/null || true; fi
